name: math-c
body:
#math-c

Just a few simple math-related C and C++ programs and functions, written mostly as programming practice and examples of good style.

These are written extremely pedantically in either Allman or OTB styles, with 2-space or 4-space indentation.


#### Benchmarks for the factorial functions
##### Recursive factorial_r(12), 100,000,000 iterations

    real    0m6.067s
    user    0m5.861s
    sys     0m0.039s

##### For-loop factorial_f(12), 100,000,000 iterations

    real    0m4.656s
    user    0m4.596s
    sys     0m0.030s

##### Recursive factorial_r(3), 100,000,000 iterations

    real    0m1.248s
    user    0m1.231s
    sys     0m0.009s

##### For-loop factorial_f(3), 100,000,000 iterations

    real    0m0.918s
    user    0m0.735s
    sys     0m0.007s
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
